title: How to solve number series quickly - Quora

response.answer_text: Try to solve maximum possible types of questions from different booksMake a full list of all possible types and remember all these typesWrite down hints before the questionsThen after one week revise try solve all question mentally, if unable to solve check hint very quickly.Thus revise and give previous year test many times.Soon you will find you are very strong in number seriesThis is very important chapter if you become expert at number series it will improve your mental skills, memory, concentration, interest, speed, calculation.This chapter like Warm up After doing this chapter you will find other chapters also very easy. Thus it can improve your understanding level.And with a glance you should be able to find the type of that question.I am mentioning some types here. Difference of Numbers: 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 , 30, …?.., …?…. 5, 6, 10, 19, 35, …?.., …?…. difference of squares Difference of Differences or Progressive differences: 5, 6, 9, 14, 21, …?.., …?…. Multiplication of previous term: 5, 10, 20, 40, 80, 160, (this is Geometric series also) If difference is becoming huge it may be based on multiplication Fractional Multiplication: 5, 2.5, 5, 7.5, 15, 37.5, …?.., …?…. Multiplication and Plus or Minus: 5, 11, 21, 43, 85, …?.., …?…. (x 2 +1 , x 2 - 1 ) Random pattern: 66, 36, 18, …?.. 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64, 81, …?.., …?…. (square) 0, 9, 26, 65, 124, 217, …?.., …?…. ( cube -1, cube +1 ) Complex Series : There are so many permutation and combination possible with mentioned above. Do Practice! Do your Best!!

There is no golden trick that's solves every number series question. But as far as hacks are concerned, I think I can provide you some pointers. Try checking differences between terms, and the differences between those differences and so on.Try using squares or cubes of numbers combined with adding or subtracting numbers.If these don't work, try to think outside the box. Like days of the week, years of the month, characters in a series. Maybe it's the letters of some word and the numbers are just characters in the alphabet.Usually these three can help you a lot. Although you can always ask for hints. Hope this helps. -/T/

TO SOLVE SERIES NUMBER PROBLEM WE MUST FOLLOW SOME RULES OR CONDITIONS. MOST OF NUMBER PROBLEM ARE IN SQUARES FORM WITH 1 NUMBER SUBTRACT OR ADD IN EQUATION for example 3 ,8,15 ,24 and so on.MOST OF NUMBER PROBLEMS ARE IN FORM OF ADDITION OR SUBTRACTION OF SAME NUMBER WITH ADDING OR SUBTRACTING DIGIT IN INCREASING OR DECREASING ORDER LIKE 2,5,8,11 AND LIKE 2 ,5 ,9 ,14 increased in each no.

The best way to solve the number series is that first assume the patterns of all the numbers given in the question and then try to co-relate the numbers with each other.Generally it seems that the 1st part is mostly related to the 3rd part and the 2nd part is related to the 4th part and the process continues.Don't be hesitate put all your efforts in it.

Series problems entirely depends on our manipulation technique which helps us to find the pattern of the series. Following steps might help you to solve series problems: Read about arithmetic progression , geometric progression, arithmetic geometric progression ,harmonic progression.Solve as much problem as you can related to these topics.Try to visualize the trend of next number of series from previous numbers.If you fail to visualize any series , see the answer but try to recall this problem again after some days.

You need to analyse the the series in several different ways. You can't approach the series in only one way. you need to think. Most of the series, consisting of multiple's of numbers, difference between numbers etc… For a real time example: Number Series Methods shortcut tricks - Math Shortcut Tricks

There different kind of number series. The very basic series follow AP and GP rules. But all we need in a series is to analyse whether how the first number is related to the next number and so on. If we see a pattern repeating then the next number can be calculated using the pattern only. A tip would be: Atleast observe first four numbers to find the accurate pattern.

you have to note the relationship between the last and the next following number. this may be -ve,+ve,, x or÷. having checked the correctness of this relationship, use the same to forecast the next required number which will respect the relationship noted earlier.
Best way is to start viewing the numbers from different angles of addition subtraction sqares division and look for interrelaton between these numbers
1.The number series to be read carefully. 2.Should try to understand the relationship within the series. 3.Arrive at the next number in the series based on relationship identified.
First try to find the pattern in which the numbers are arranged. Find out the relation between connective numbers in the series.
I usually put my sums in a TI-nspire, or the Taylor Series Function on the Ti-NSpire, if it’s a test I will do it by hand to show that I know it.
A. P(arithmatic progression) G. P(Geometric progression)
